title: 6g produces "internal compiler error: fault"
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. 6g bug.go

What is the expected output?
Either nothing (compiled fine) or a proper error message.

What do you see instead?
internal compiler error: fault

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
debian testing 64-bit

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
c2b8c9f13fb8+ release/release.2010-09-29

Please provide any additional information below.
The code is probably wrong, but presumably should get a proper error message
Attachments: 1. bug.go (741 bytes)
